data.title: Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson Relationship: A Complete Timeline
data.meta_description: Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson have broken up after nine months together. Here, a timeline of their relationship, from their first date to their split.
data.text:
One of the hottest celeb couples of 2022 called it quits. After nine months together, Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson broke up, shocking fans. Just days before their split, sources claimed that the two were “smitten” with each other and were making their long-distance relationship work while Pete filmed a movie in Australia and Kim remained stateside in Los Angeles. But the Kim-Pete era appears to be over.

A romance between the two started to surface after the duo shared an on-screen kiss during Kim’s Saturday Night Live appearance in October 2021. It continued to pick up steam as Kim and Pete joined the mogul's sis, Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker, for fun-filled double dates, vacationed together, and even walked some major red carpets as a couple (hello, Met Gala!). The two got pretty serious — Pete even inked four tattoos dedicated to Kim on himself.

Despite the split, the former couple is reportedly still in contact, leading many to wonder if Kim and Pete are really done for good. If you’re looking to walk down memory lane and are still wondering how this unlikely duo became one of social media’s hottest topics, read on for a complete relationship timeline of Kim and Pete’s months-long romance.

June 8, 2023: Kim says her relationship with Pete makes her want to 'sneak around' with her new mystery man

In the latest episode of , Kim dished that while she has moved on to another, she's not quite ready to reveal the identity of her mystery man just yet. The star opened up about her very public relationship with Pete.

"You obviously learn from every situation, and I feel the one thing I learned from last situation was the media made me feel like I was in a very serious relationship so quickly. I just want to sneak around a little bit. There's nothing wrong with wanting to sneak!" Kim said in a confessional.

June 1, 2023: Kim said she cautioned Pete at the start of their relationship

While Kim and Pete remained pretty low-key throughout the course of their nine-month relationship, the SKIMS founder is opening up about their romance — and eventual split — in the latest season of The Kardashians. In the June 1 episode, Kim talks to Scott Disick and her sis Khloé Kardashian about the struggles of dating someone when you’re on a reality show (a very famous one at that), and shares that at the beginning of their relationship, she had a candid conversation with Pete about it.

“It’s hard when you start dating someone, and you live your life on a reality show, so Pete and I had that conversation right away. You obviously know what you're getting yourself into,” she told Scott and Khlo. “But then the fans were like, ‘Pete’s not on the show.’ And I was like, ‘We said that from the start. It’s not what he does.’”

“But then I opened up, then I had him on the show, I talked about every last thing,” she continued. (ICYMI, Pete briefly appeared on the show during season 2, when he and Kim attended the 2022 Met Gala together.) “He was on at what level he was comfortable with,” Kim added in a confessional scene.

May 30, 2023: Kim “has her eye” on “somebody special”

Kim is seemingly moving on after her split from Pete. An unnamed source dished to Us Weekly about the state of Kim's love life and the possibility of her being involved in a new romance. “Kim isn’t officially dating anybody, but there is somebody who she’s interested in,” the source said. “So far, there have only been subtle flirtations between them, but they haven’t gone out yet.”

According to the insider, Kim is “interested in pursuing things,” but she wants to “keep it under the radar” if things progress. “She’s not ready to be seen out on a date with anybody for the time being because she doesn't want to make it a big deal,” the source continued. “She knows once she’s seen on a date then things get blown out of proportion quickly, but there is somebody special she has her eye on, so she’s excited about where things could go.”

May 25, 2023: Kim opens up about her breakup with Pete

Nine months after Kim and Pete parted ways, the reality star opened up about their split. During the season 3 premiere of Hulu’s The Kardashians, Kim told Scott Disick and sister Khloé Kardashian that she and Pete “had talks and talks” and both “communicated really well about it.”

“Breakups are just like, not my thing,” she explained. “It’s obviously sad... [Nine months] is a long time.” Kim added that she felt “a lot of guilt” about their break-up, considering that Pete “went through a lot” because of her relationship with ex-husband, Kanye West. When their split first made headlines, Kim and Pete’s teams cited long-distance and their busy schedules as the catalyst. Reports claimed that Kim wasn’t ready to date after Pete, which the Skims founder seemed to confirm during a Kardashians confessional. “I’m single and I’m not ready to mingle and that’s OK,” she admitted to cameras.

May 1, 2023: Kim and Pete reunite at the 2023 Met Gala

All appears to be well between exes Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson. The former couple was all smiles as photographers snapped pictures of a conversation between Kim, Pete, and R&B legend Usher.

The duo's friendly reunion was a bit serendipitous as Kim and Pete attended last year's Met Gala as a couple.

November 2, 2022: Kim and Pete are “not speaking”

It’s been three months since Kim and Pete split, and although fans recently speculated that the exes are texting again, we’re sorry to say that no, that is not the case. On November 2, an insider told E! News that Kim and Pete “are not speaking” and “not hanging out again.”

Eyebrows raised on Kim’s 42nd birthday, when she uploaded a photo of a gorgeous bouquet of flowers and a Jasmin Diptyque candle — many thought that the sweet gift was from Pete, due to the fact that their first kiss happened during their Saturday Night Live Aladdin and Jasmine sketch. Then, on October 24, Entertainment Tonight reported that Kim and Pete “still keep in touch.”

But it appears that the rumors are *not* true, and the two are keeping their distance following their break-up.

October 22, 2022: Pete allegedly sent Kim flowers for her birthday

Kim took to social media to showcase beautiful floral arrangements she received in honor of her 42nd birthday. A jasmin-scented Diptyque candle stood out to many followers after Kim shared her birthday gifts on her Instagram Story. Many believe the florals and candle were a gift from Pete as a nod to the “Jasmine and Aladdin” sketch (which served as their first on-screen kiss) during a Saturday Night Live sketch in October 2021. Before their split, Pete even inked the names of the Disney characters to celebrate his then-girlfriend.

News of the rumored gift comes after a source revealed to Entertainment Tonight that Kim and Pete have been communicating. According to ET, “Pete and Kim still keep in touch.” A source told the outlet that the former couple's split “wasn't a bad fallout or breakup, so things are good between them, and they've remained in contact.”

October 15, 2022: Kim and Pete have been texting each other for support

Despite the fact that they're no longer dating, Hollywood Life reported that the former couple have been texting each other recently.

Following the situation with Kim's ex-husband Kanye West (the antisemitic comments and the "White Lives Matter" shirt at Paris Fashion Week, among other things), a source confirmed to Hollywood Life that lots of people have been reaching out to offer their support to Kim — including Pete Davidson.

“Pete has texted Kim a few times about the whole Kanye situation because he still cares about her as a person and wanted to check in to see how she was doing,” the source explained. “He’s in the middle of shooting another movie but he’s been in touch. He’s such a sweet guy and Kim’s grateful they can still be friends.”

October 6, 2022: Kim has a sweet theory for why “hot girls” fall for Pete

Season two of The Kardashians is currently airing on Hulu, and even though Kim and Pete are now broken up (💔), they were still together at the time of the reality series’ filming. In the latest episode, Kim is in Milan, Italy for Fashion Week with Kendall. During a break between shows and events, the business mogul embarks on a shopping trip, and purchases a New York Yankees hat for the Staten Island native.

When the episode cuts to a confessional interview, Kim opens up about why women are so attracted to Pete. “Pete has the best heart. I feel like people, they have this, like, idea of him that he dates all these hot girls and, like, he does, but he’s just, like, the sweetest, most thoughtful person,” she shared. “And I’m here in Milan, and thinking about him, so just wanna pick up just, like, a little thoughtful gift.” Aw. 🥺

October 4, 2022: Pete may have removed one of his tattoos dedicated to Kim

Although Kim and Pete split in early August, the comedian still faces a few, um, unavoidable reminders of their former relationship. ICYMI, Kim revealed back in March that Pete had inked a handful of tattoos dedicated to her. One of these included a tat on his chest that read, “My Girl Is a Lawyer.” But, according to new photos published by TMZ, it seems that the comedian has removed the ink.

On set in New York City for his new comedy series, Bupkis, Pete was photographed with a white bandage on his collarbone. The covering seems to be exactly where his Kim-centric “lawyer” tattoo was placed. But one source close to Pete told Entertainment Tonight that “while he continues to remove his tattoos, that image is from set and not related to removing the lawyer tattoo.”

So it remains a mystery for now, but don’t forget — Pete *also* has “Jasmine ∞ Aladdin” (a nod to their shared sketch on Saturday Night Live) and Kim’s children’s initials tattooed on his chest. Oh, and he branded “KIM” on himself too. The removal process might be a bit trickier for that one.

September 26, 2022: Kim says she's uninterested in dating following her breakup with Pete

Kim is taking it slow after ending things with Pete over a month ago. While she previously joked about the types of men that she'd like to date after their split, Kim recently revealed that she wants to take her time before getting into another relationship. The SKIMS founder appeared on Live with Kelly and Ryan, where she confirmed that she sees herself with "absolutely no one" in the very near future.

"I’m not looking for anything," she added. "I think I really just need to be by myself and focus and finish school and focus [on] my kids."

Kim's comments come after she appeared on the Late Late Show With James Corden, where she joked about visiting "a hospital and meet a doctor" or possibly finding a new bf at a "law firm." She also said that she thought she'd end up with someone who worked as a "scientist, neuroscientist, biochemist, doctor, [or] attorney."

September 6, 2022: Kim calls Pete "such a good person"

Kim and Pete split one month ago, but in her cover story for Interview magazine, the reality star gushed over her then-boyfriend.

“He’s a cutie. He’s literally such a good person, they don’t really make them like him anymore,” Kim said. “I’m excited for what he has coming up.”

Kim presumably sat down for this interview before she and Pete broke up, but it’s evident that the business mogul always admired and supported him. At the time of their split, sources close to the couple revealed to E! News that they had “a lot of love and respect for each other,” but their busy schedules “made it really difficult to maintain a relationship.”

And while Kim only has good things to say about Pete, it’s unlikely that the pair will get back together. “It was an amicable split. They had discussed ending their relationship for a bit. It wasn’t sudden,” one insider told People in early August. “And it was a mutual decision. Getting back together is not in the cards right now.” Sigh.

August 23, 2022: A source says that Kim is ready to date again after her break-up with Pete

Although Kim and Pete's romantic journey ended a few weeks ago, an anonymous source tells E! News that the reality star turned business mogul is ready to start dating again. According to the source, Kim is "asking who she should date next" and that "all of her friends are constantly trying to set her up."

A second source chimed in, telling E! News the qualities Kim is looking for in her next relationship. "Kim's expressed she's ready to date someone older but it has to be the right person who understands her life," they said. "She isn't compromising her freedom right now." They also revealed that she "enjoys dating and is definitely open to putting herself out there again."

August 17, 2022: Pete will barely appear in the upcoming season of The Kardashians

Hulu's hit series The Kardashians filmed its second season as Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson's former relationship flourished. The duo's preparation for their official red carpet debut at the 2022 Met Gala was highlighted in a teaser for the upcoming season, but that's as involved as Pete will reportedly get on the reality show. A source close to the Saturday Night Live comedian told Page Six that Pete will barely appear in the upcoming season. "He's in the background, but the reality world is not built for people like Pete," the source revealed. "He was not on the first season. I don't know how they're doing the second season, but he's not a part of that world." Further details on how the series will discuss Kim and Pete's breakup have not been confirmed. We'll all just have to wait and see what happens when The Kardashians season two debuts on September 22.

August 8, 2022: Kim supports Pete's decision to seek therapy

On Monday, August 8, People reported that Pete Davidson has been in trauma therapy due to online harassment from Kim Kardashian's ex-husband Kanye West.

According to Page Six, Kim agrees with Pete's decision. "Kim was very supportive of Pete going to therapy," a source told the media outlet. "Kanye was very detrimental. He was posting negative things — now add thousands and thousands of comments. Someone has to work with you to deal with something like that."

Pete reportedly sought trauma therapy in April after receiving death threats from Kanye's fans. "Getting death threats from [Kanye's] fans and all the negative attention online doesn't feel good for the average person — add someone who’s struggled with mental illness, and it’s even worse," the source said.

When news of Kim and Pete's breakup surfaced online, Kanye posted (and deleted) an edited newspaper cover announcing the death of Skete, the nickname the rapper dubbed Pete when he first began dating Kim.

August 6, 2022: Kim and Pete break up

It’s a breakup that truly none of us here at Seventeen saw coming. On Friday evening, E! News reported that Kim and Pete broke up after nine months together.Insiders close to the couple reportedly told the outlet that Kim and Pete have “a lot of love and respect for each other” but realized that the demands of their busy schedules “made it really difficult to maintain a relationship.” The outlet confirmed that Kim and ex Kanye West are still moving ahead with their divorce.

Multiple rumors of why Kim and Pete split so suddenly have started to surface. Some sources say it was too difficult for them to maintain a relationship with their busy schedules, as mentioned above, but others told Page Six that Kim was left “totally exhausted by this relationship and other things going on in her life.” 😳

“Pete is 28 and Kim is 41 — they are just in very different places at the moment, ” the source shared with the outlet. “Pete is totally spontaneous and impulsive and wants her to fly to New York, or wherever he is on a moment’s notice... But Kim has four kids and it isn’t that easy. She needs to focus on the kids.”

Around the time the news broke, Kim posted a carousel of selfies of herself and her kids wearing Yeezy’s new collection of sunglasses. Meanwhile, Pete was spotted celebrating his sister’s graduation from the physician’s assistant program at Pace University in New York City. But a day later, E! News shared a photo of Pete making a bold fashion statement following the split — back in Australia on the set of his new film Wizards!, the comedian wore a shirt that read “What... I feel like s**t.” 🥺🥺🥺

August 1, 2022: Kim and Pete are making their long-distance relationship work

They say absence makes the heart grow fonder, and it's apparently true for Kim and Pete. A source told E! News that "The distance hasn't been an issue for Kim and Pete's relationship while he's been away filming. They are still going strong and making it work."

Kim just visited Pete in Australia, but even “when they are apart, they are in constant communication,” “FaceTime consistently,” and are “always getting quick phone calls in when they can," according to the source.

So in other words, the two are still going strong and are totally obsessed with each other. “Kim loves that he’s always making her laugh and he truly makes her day when they talk. She is still smitten over him and it just works for her," the insider says.

Though it is unclear when Pete’s movie wraps production, the source adds that he'll be heading straight to Los Angeles ASAP, saying Pete wants to "spend time with her for a few days."

July 16, 2022: Kim travels to Australia to visit Pete

We reportedly have a new location unlocked for Kim and Pete's whirlwind romance — Cairns, Queensland in Australia. According to the Daily Mail, the reality star jetted off in her private jet to the land down under to reunite with her beau after four weeks apart.

Pete is in Australia to shoot his new A24 film Wizards!, alongside Orlando Bloom, Naomi Scott, and Sean Harris. E! News reports that the trip is a quick one, and according to a family insider, "She wanted to spend time with her kids before she left and did some special travel with them. Now she's off to see Pete and is very excited."

We cannot wait to see the vacation pics.

July 12, 2022: Pete says he wants to be a father one day

Just one day after Kim shared a carousel of new pics of her and Pete, offering fans another small glimpse into their romance, the Saturday Night Live comedian shared a *major* relationship goal of his.

In a clip posted by E! News from the upcoming season of Kevin Hart's Hart to Heart series, Pete expresses that he's "definitely a family guy" and hopes to be a father one day.

"My favorite thing ever, which I have yet to achieve, is I want to have a kid. That's like my dream," he said. "I'm so excited for like, that chapter, so like, that's kind of what I'm just preparing for now, is trying to be like as good of a dude, and develop, and get better, so when that happens, it's just easier." My heart. 🥺

Kim shares her four children, North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalm, with ex-husband Kanye West, but she hinted back in April that she'd like to have kids with Pete. When the Kar-Jenner fam was asked in an interview with Access Hollywood who would have six children like their matriarch Kris Jenner, Kim nominated herself. After being asked if Pete will be around "for a long time or a good time," Kim responded, "All of the above, hopefully." Awwww.

July 11, 2022: Kim posts adorable couple pics + Pete makes a cameo in The Kardashians season 2 teaser

It's a busy day for Pete and Kim who have decided it's time to give us all of the sweetest (and steamiest) moments of their relationship — and we are so here for it!

For starters, the first promo for The Kardashians season two dropped, and IMHO, the most important tidbit was the last couple of seconds of the clip. After Kim asks if he wants to shower with her, Pete is seen tossing his phone and scurrying after her into the bathroom. Watch the full snippet here to see what steamy Kete moments we may be in for when the season premieres on September 22.

Deciding that blessing us with that hot clip was not enough, Kim took to Instagram to show off a set of new shots featuring — you guessed it — her and Pete. The pics, seemingly taken while the two are just chillaxing around the house, also reveal Pete's possible new tattoo on his right shoulder with the words "Jasmine" and "Aladdin," referencing the SNL sketch the two starred in together. Above that tattoo, you can see the letters "NSCP," which are the initials of Kim's children North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalm, who she shares with ex-husband, Kanye West.

June 13, 2022: Kim shares the cutest pics from a tropical vacay with Pete

Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson are getting pretty hot. The Skims mogul shared pictures of a recent beachside baecation with her boyfriend, and the views are out of this world. Along with sporting bleach blonde locks, the duo served major couple's goals with matching black swimwear. Kim shared nine pictures and one video in a carousel post on Instagram. Some of the swoon-worthy shots include a selfie Pete took of Kim's feet as they kayaked on crystal clear water and a shot of them standing in the water, sharing an adorable smooch.

June 5, 2022: Pete holds hands with Saint West during trip to The Cheesecake Factory

Things are continuing to grow between Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson. The comedian was spotted holding hands with Kim's six-year-old son Saint West while they shopped at The Grove in Los Angeles, and walked into The Cheesecake Factory in pics obtained by TMZ. According to the outlet, neither Kim nor the rest of her other children were spotted during Pete and Saint's apparent playdate at The Grove.

June 2, 2022: Megan Fox initially told Pete it was "never gonna happen" when he asked for Kim's number

ICYMI, rumors of Kim and Pete's romance started circulating after her Saturday Night Live appearance in October 2021. But turns out, their relationship could have started months (!!) earlier.

During episode 8 of The Kardashians, it was revealed that Pete initially asked Megan Fox for Kim's number way before she hosted SNL — but Megan wasn't having it.

"After we got together and it was like a thing, Megan Fox texted me, and is like, 'Is this s**t for real because... he asked me for your number months ago,'" Kim said in a confessional. "And like, 'I was like, Dude, you have a better shot of, like, me and MGK getting eaten by crocodiles than you ever getting her number. Like, never gonna happen. Do not ask us.'"

Ouch, Megan.

Kim also shared what, um, quality initially attracted her to Pete, and how she made the first move in their relationship.

"I did SNL, and then when we kissed in scene, it was just a vibe. And I was like, 'Oh shit, maybe— maybe I just need to try something different.' But Pete does not come to my afterparty," she said. "Everyone was at my afterparty. Does not give me the time of day. So, a few days later, I called the producer at SNL, and I was like, 'Hey, do you have Pete's number?'"

"And I text him. I wasn't even thinking like, 'Oh my god, I'm gonna be in a relationship with him.' I was just thinking like, 'Heard about this BDE. Need to get out there.' Like I need to just, like... jumpstart my — I was just basically DTF," she continued. But that's not all. The SKIMS mogul also expressed how "genuine" Pete is, and that he's the "best human being" she's ever met.

May 27, 2022: Pete debuts bleached hair that matches Kim's look

The comedian made his first public appearance since signing off Saturday Night Live on May 21 when the former cast member was seen outside an office in Calabasas, wearing a shower cap covering freshly dyed platinum blond hair according to E! News.

To further, uh, accentuate his new look, the couple took to IG to commemorate the twinning moment in a series of stories that thankfully fan pages @kkwwrld and @ketekardashian saved so we can remember this moment forever (or at least until they do something else that's as equally adorable).

May 21, 2022: Kim subtly supports Pete for his final night on Saturday Night Live

The past few days have been major for the Kar-Jenners and those close to them. On Sunday, May 22, Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker tied the knot (for the third time) in Portofino, Italy. Kim and her daughter North West attended the extravagant affair, but Pete had an obligation back in New York that kept him from celebrating with the fam on the Italian Riviera — Saturday, May 21 marked his final appearance on Saturday Night Live. The comedian was a cast member on the legendary sketch show for eight years.

Although the couple couldn't be with each other for these big moments, Kim had a sweet, subtle way of keeping her BF close to her heart. On Instagram, the reality star uploaded a photo of her hot-pink manicure, which featured a small bedazzled "P" on one of her nails.

"Okay this is adorable," one user commented while another wrote, "We stan a loving gf ❤️❤️❤️." On her Instagram Story, Kim reposted a collage of Pete's SNL appearances, which was created by user @ketekardashian. So cute. 💖

May 2, 2022: Pete and Kim make their Met Gala debut

Pete and Kim officially made their debut on the steps of the Met. A freshly platinum blonde Kim pulled up in Marilyn Monroe's iconic custom-made Jean Louis dress, which is covered in crystals and reportedly valued at around USD $5 million. The American icon originally wore the dress to sing "Happy Birthday" to President John F. Kennedy in 1962.

"I had this idea to put it on and try it on. They came with armed guards and gloves. I tried it on and it didn't fit me," Kim told Vogue correspondent Lala Anthony before she revealed that she lost 16 (!) pounds in three weeks to fit into the dress for the evening.

"[Kim] didn't let me wear my propeller hat, but it's fine," Pete, who wore a classic black suit, joked. Kim then dished that she skipped carbs and sugar for weeks in preparation for fashion's biggest night — adding that the couple is going to celebrate with pizza and donuts back at their hotel.

After the Met Gala, she posted Instagram stories showing fans her favorite "carbs" in New York City: Joe's Pizza and Doughnuttery donuts. "So, after the Met, I am starving," she said in the clip. "And my favorite donuts in the entire world, in New York City, are these mini donuts. Oh my gosh, you guys. I have them in the room. How cute is this?"

She panned her phone over to several boxes of large pizzas and showed off the pies. "You guys, I haven't had carbs or sugar in almost a month," she explained. "Definitely three weeks. This pizza — I'm so excited!"

April 30, 2022: Pete seemingly inked Kim and her Kids' initials on his neck

Back in March, Kim K revealed that Pete dedicated "a few" new tattoos to her, including one *branding* of her name. Now, it seems that the Saturday Night Live comedian inked another homage to his GF on his neck.

In a series of photos posted on social media, Pete was spotted leaving the Fonda Theater in Los Angeles, and just above his t-shirt collar, he appeared to have a new tat that read "KNSCP." Fans immediately connected the ink to the reality star and her four children with ex-husband Kanye West, theorizing that the initials stand for Kim, North, Saint, Chicago, and Psalm. But neither Kim or Pete have confirmed that that's true, so for now, the meaning behind the tattoo is pure speculation.

Beyond the tattoo guesswork, this past weekend proved to be a headline-making one for the couple. On Saturday, April 30, Kim and Pete made their red carpet debut at the annual White House Correspondents' Dinner in Washington, D.C. Kim stunned in a glistening silver Balenciaga gown and Lorraine Schwartz jewels, while Pete rocked a black Prada suit and Vans. Kim documented the evening, and her and Pete's sweet chemistry, in a carousel of snaps on Instagram.

April 24, 2022: Kim and Pete attend the 23rd Annual Mark Twain Prize For American Humor in Washington, D.C.

Spotted! Our favorite couple just made a rare appearance at the 23rd Annual Mark Twain Prize For American Humor in Washington, D.C., which makes this Kete's second official event appearance together.

April 13, 2022: Kim hints at wanting kids with Pete

Kim played a question game with the rest of the Kar-Jenner clan during an interview with Access Hollywood. When the A-List family was asked which of them will have six kids, like their mom, Kris Jenner, everyone brought up a photo of Kourtney as their final answer. However, Kim also held up a photo of herself. When asked if Pete was going to be here "for a long time or a good time," Kim said, "All of the above, hopefully."

April 12, 2022: Kim reveals she "wasn't planning on" being in a relationship with Pete

Kim made an appearance on and revealed that she was single for 10 months before she was ready to hit the dating scene again.

"I think that, you know, sometimes things happen when you just least expect it. [Dating] was the last thing that I was really planning on," she said, "And so when it did happen, we were kind of, like, 'Oh, my God, I wasn't planning on this. And this isn't even what I was thinking of,' and it just makes it that much sweeter and so much more fun."

"I definitely took my time. I took, you know, 10 months or something before I dated or talked to anyone. And I just wanted that time to really figure out and go through the motions: 'Am I making the right decision? How do I feel about this?'" Kim continued. "So once I went through all of the motions, I finally was, like, 'OK, guys, I am so ready to meet someone.' And I randomly did."

Although #Kete is all anyone can talk about these days, the reality star and beauty mogul admitted that she's keeping certain aspects of her relationship private. "I do think that I am holding, you know, a little bit more close to my heart on certain aspects of my relationship with Pete, and it feels good just to know that, like, we have this connection and we have our little bubble of a relationship world that we live in that, like, not a lot of people know about," she said.

April 11, 2022: Kim shares romantic date night pics on Instagram

Remember how the pair was seen together at The Kardashians premiere? Well, their evening didn't stop there. Kardashian posted two steamy, PDA-packed pictures to Instagram on April 11. We see them embracing in the corner booth at popular L.A. Italian restaurant Jon & Vinny's. The flirtatious photos were captioned "late nite snack."

Kourtney Kardashian, Travis Barker, Jonathan Cheban, and Tracy and Roy Romulus also joined the pair for this dinner.

April 7, 2022: Kim and Pete attend Hulu's The Kardashians premiere together

Davidson has shown that he's a super caring BF, and it looks like that support extends to the couple's milestones. While Pete and Kim did not walk the red carpet together at The Kardashians premiere, Kim did tell E! News that "He's here to support me. It's my thing. I don't think it's his thing to be all up here with me. So, I'm just so happy he's here."

In a March Variety interview, Kim revealed that while Pete will not be appearing in season one of The Kardashians, the couple is open to sharing their love story on reality TV in the future. "I have not filmed with him,” Kim said, “and I’m not opposed to it. It’s just not what he does. But if there was an event happening and he was there, he wouldn’t tell the cameras to get away.”

Fingers crossed we will get to see the blossoming romance in season two!

April 5, 2022: Kim and her family talk about her relationship with Pete

Kim Kardashian is "at peace" with her new boyfriend. During an interview with Robin Roberts for Good Morning America, Kim gushed about her new relationship and revealed her intentions. "I am a relationship kind of girl, for sure, and I wouldn't be with someone if I didn't plan on spending a lot of my time with them," the SKIMS mogul revealed. "Obviously, I want to take my time, but I'm very happy and very content. And, it's such a good feeling to be at peace."

Kim's mother, Kris Jenner, and sister Khloé Kardashian joined in, sharing their thoughts on the lovebirds. "Pete's great, Pete's great," Kris said. "He's a really nice guy." Khloé echoed similar sentiments. "He just makes her laugh and she laughs all the time."

April 4, 2022: Kim meets Pete's grandparents

If there was ever any doubt, things are continuing to heat up for Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson. Things are so serious between the new couple that Kim has officially met Pete's grandparents. According to TMZ, the SKIMS mogul flew out to New York City to visit her comedian/actor boyfriend while he was filming a new project. Production for the upcoming movie took place near his grandparent's home on Staten Island, so the couple went to visit.

April 4, 2022: Pete drove Kim's pink golf cart

Pete used Kim's hot pink golf cart to deliver pizza and hang out with Scott Disick, proving that he's getting even closer to his girlfriend's friends and family.

March 26, 2022: Kim shows off one of the tattoos Pete dedicated to her

Kim revealed on The Ellen Show that Pete has a handful of tattoos dedicated to her, including one "branding" of her name. One tat in particular is an homage to Kim's burgeoning career in law and simply reads, "My girl is a lawyer." The reality star took to her Instagram Stories to show off the fresh ink, which is positioned right below Pete's neck. The story has since expired, but a number of fan accounts captured the snap.

While Kim is not *yet* a lawyer, she passed California's baby bar exam — otherwise known as the First-Year Law Students' Examination in the Golden State — in December 2021 and therefore, is one step closer to becoming Kim Kardashian, Attorney at Law. Suffice to say, we love the support from Pete.

March 23, 2022: Pete's mom unknowingly fueled social media rumors

Pete Davidson's mom caused quite the stir. On Wednesday, a fan account posted a carousel of paparazzi images of Kim and Pete driving in Los Angeles. One user commented, "She will be pregnant with his child by the end of the year. ❤️," then tagged @amyymarie118 — the Instagram account that reportedly belongs to Pete's mom, Amy Davidson. Although the comment has since been deleted, Amy allegedly replied back, "Yayyyy!" But before it disappeared, some eagle-eyed fans captured the exchange in screenshots.

Pete has dedicated a couple of new tattoos to Kim, but the couple has never commented on whether or not they'd start a family together.

March 19, 2022: Pete appears on Scott Disick's Instagram

Pete just became Instagram official with another member of the Kar-Jenner crew: Kourtney's ex, Scott Disick. Pete didn't make the grid, but he did have a surprise cameo at the end of Scott's Instagram Stories. While Kim was in Miami celebrating the launch of her new SKIMS Swim line, the comedian captured a quiet evening spent with Scott. "Boyz night was wild 🛌 🛌 🛌 🛌," he wrote in the video, as the camera panned around the living room and caught Scott and two others snoozing through the 1983 film, "The King of Comedy." At the last second, Pete — the cameraman — reveals himself, sporting a deadpan smirk.

March 16, 2022: Kim reveals that Pete has her name branded on his body

In her latest interview on The Ellen Show, Kim admitted that Pete got some ink dedicated to her — as in, two tattoos. It was first caught by @notskinnybutnotfat on Instagram, but Kim also confirmed that Pete got a third design that's "actually a branding" of her name. The difference? Branding doesn't involve ink and leaves a permanent scar from a burn, whereas tattoos can eventually be removed.

"I think he was like, 'I want something that's there that I can't, you know, get rid of,' cause he's in the process of getting rid of his arm tats and his neck tats," Kim said of Pete branding her name. "So he's like, 'I don't wanna be able to get rid of it or to cover it up, and I just wanted it, like, there as a scar on me.'" She added that his other tattoos are "cutesy things," like "My girl is a lawyer."

March 13, 2022: Text messages between Pete and Kim's ex-husband are leaked

It was quite the newsworthy weekend for Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson. After going Instagram official on Friday, March 11 (see below), five screenshots of a leaked text conversation between Pete and Kim's ex, Kanye West, emerged. In the alleged exchange, Pete defends his GF Kim and affirms that he is "done being quiet" over Kanye's incessant social media posts about their relationship.

"Yo it's Skete," Pete wrote in the first text, per Page Six. ICYMI, "Skete" is the nickname Kanye made up for Pete weeks earlier. "Can you please take a second and calm down... It's 8am and it don't gotta be like this. Kim is literally the best mother I've ever met. What she does for those kids is amazing and you are so f***ing lucky that she's your kids mom. I've decided I'm not gonna let you treat us this way anymore and I'm done being quiet. Grow the f**k up."

When Kanye asked Pete where he was, the Saturday Night Live comedian replied: "In bed with your wife." He then followed up with a selfie of himself, laying down and throwing up the peace sign.

In the following texts, Pete implored Kanye to seek mental health treatment, writing, "Let me help you man... I struggle with mental stuff too... It's not an easy journey... You don't have to feel this way anymore... There's no shame in having a little help... You'll be so happy and at peace." Kanye offered to talk with him at Sunday Service, but Pete urged to meet privately in person, "man to man."

Pete continued to explain to Kanye that, despite his many troublesome social media posts and videos, he claims he has stopped Saturday Night Live and other stand-up comedians from poking fun at him and the whole situation.

"But if you continue to press me like you have for the past 6 months I'm gonna stop being nice," Pete concluded. His texts — which were uploaded in a since-deleted Instagram post by SNL writer and Pete's longtime friend Dave Sirus — came after Kanye posted a video on his Instagram account and claimed that Pete was "antagonizing" him over text. "A message from Pete," Dave captioned the post, alongside the five screenshots of the text conversation.

Although Pete has not commented publicly on the texts, a source close to Kanye confirmed to E! News that the exchange is real.

March 11, 2022: Kim and Pete go public on Instagram

The moment we have ALL been waiting for: Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson are Instagram official. Kim shared a carousel of pictures to her 'gram on Friday, where Pete is featured in two adorable candids. "Whose car are we gonna take?!," she captioned the post.

This is major news. Within one hour, the post has earned more than 1.9 million likes. Even sis Khloe commented, "I love this." So do we, Khlo.

March 9, 2022: Pete won't appear in this season of The Kardashians

The Kardashians is just over one month away from its premiere date, and in a new interview with Variety, Kim answered the one question that's been on every fan's mind: Will Pete appear in the new Hulu series?

"I have not filmed with him," the reality star told the outlet. "And I’m not opposed to it. It’s just not what he does. But if there was an event happening and he was there, he wouldn’t tell the cameras to get away. I think I might film something really exciting coming, but it wouldn’t be for this season."

So we won't see Pete on our screens (this season, at least), but viewers will receive answers about how their romance started. Kim revealed that we'll learn "how we met and who reached out to who and how it happened and all the details that everyone wants to know... I’m definitely open to talking, and I definitely explain it."

March 3, 2022: Kim supports Pete on Twitter

Kim Kardashian just gave a subtle show of support for Pete Davidson. In what might be her most public acknowledgment of their romance so far, Kim liked a Tweet from actor James Gunn that praises Pete as one of the "nicest, sweetest guys."

Instagram account "Comments By Celebs" captured the like from the reality star and mogul. The tweet and Kim's support arrives after her ex, Kanye West, shared a grim music video for his new song "Eazy," in which he kidnaps and buries a claymation version of Pete.

March 2, 2022: Pete rejoins and quickly deactivates his Instagram

Pete's social media activity has us going in circles. ICYMI, Pete rejoined Instagram in mid-February, but de-activated his account just one week later. The comedian didn't cite a specific reason for his brief tenure on the app, although a source revealed to Page Six that when he started receiving a ton of DMs, he was reminded "why he didn’t want social media to begin with."

But once again, Pete has ghosted Instagram. Per Page Six, one fan account captured his return on Wednesday, March 2, but within two hours, users commented that he had already exited the app.

Pete's short stay on social media occurred the same day that Kim was legally declared single by a Los Angeles court — it also came after Kim's ex-husband, Kanye West, shared a music video for his song "Eazy," in which it appears he kidnaps and buries an animated Pete. "Everyone lived happily ever after," the video reads at the end. "Except Skete you know who / JK he's fine." (Kanye has been calling Pete "Skete" over the past couple weeks.) However, there's no confirmation that Pete's return to social media had any correlation to Kim's legal win, or Kanye's music video.

February 23, 2022: Pete deactivates his Instagram

One week after Pete rejoined Instagram, he deactivated his account. The Saturday Night Live comedian uploaded his first post on Wednesday, February 23, which featured a short clip from his upcoming horror-thriller film, The Home. "They're letting me add my own dialogue to The Home #welcometomyinstagram #thisisthetypeofstuffyoucanbeexpecting," Pete captioned the video, which quickly flooded with comments. But just hours later, his millions of followers noticed that the post was gone and his account appeared to be deleted.

Fans initially believed that Pete left the social media app because of Kim's ex, Kanye West. Over the past few weeks, Kanye has been consistently posting about Kim and Pete's relationship. But according to Page Six, that is not the case. "Pete deleted his IG because immediately after his first post, he started receiving a flood of messages, both positive and negative, reminding him why he didn’t want social media to begin with," a source close to Pete said.

"[Pete] is in the middle of several big film projects and wants to continue to stay very focused on his work and the positive things happening in his life," they continued. "Kanye didn’t drive Pete off social media."

February 16, 2022: Pete joins Instagram

Pete has officially reactivated his Instagram account. According to Page Six, this is the fourth time the comedian has rejoined the social media app. The first time he exited the site was in the summer of 2018, citing the negative impact it had on his mental health. "I just don't wanna be on Instagram anymore. Or on any social media platform. The internet is an evil place and it doesn’t make me feel good," he told CNN at the time. He eventually rejoined, but left again in December 2018.

But on Wednesday, Pete rebooted the verified account under the handle @pmd and hasn't uploaded any posts so far. He only follows girlfriend Kim Kardashian and actor Sebastian Stan, but he's amassed nearly 1 million followers — which includes Kim's ex-husband, Kanye West.

The timing of Pete's return has fans confused, as for the past couple weeks, Kanye has been constantly posting about Kim and Pete's romance. However, the Saturday Night Live star has not commented on the reasoning behind his latest arrival to the platform.

February 8, 2022: Pete accidentally shares a candle he got in honor of his gf

Pete Davidson unknowingly shared a household item inspired by his "girlfriend" Kim Kardashian while giving People (The TV Show!) a tour of his bedroom. Host Kay Adams asked the comedian about a candle that appeared to resemble the reality star in his background. Pete blushed and answered, "Yes, it! That is exactly what that is."

Along with officially calling Kim his girlfriend for the first time, Pete opened up about his plans for Valentine's Day. "I don't think I've ever had a Valentine's Day thing, really," he said. "So this would be the first year that I'm thinking about Valentine's Day plans, I guess."

Awwwww!

February 7, 2022: Pete officially calls Kim is "girlfriend"

Things between Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson are official. The Saturday Night Live comedian spilled the beans on their relationship status during an interview with People (The TV Show!). He referred to the reality star as his girlfriend while discussing his experience in the spotlight, and I've been swooning ever since.

"Well, I don't really have Instagram — I don't have Instagram or Twitter or any of that stuff. So, most of my daily life is getting into cars and showing up to a set," Pete said. "Or, if I'm off, I just either hang with my friends or chill with my girlfriend inside. So I don't do much," he confirmed.

January 26, 2022: Pete hangs out with Kim and several of her loved ones

It's been a busy week for Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson. Fresh off Kim's meeting with Hillary and Chelsea Clinton and the couple's appearance at Jeff Bezos' dinner party, they hit the town for a date night with their friends and family.

Kete was joined by Kim's sister Khloé Kardashian; reality starlets Olivia Pierson, Natalie Halcro; and KKW Brands CMO Tracy Romulus at Quarters Korean BBQ in Los Angeles. According to People, the crew wound up heading to 60 Out Escape Room after dinner. Sounds like the most fun date night.

January 25, 2022: Kim and Pete attend a star-studded dinner party

Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson took their love affair on the road. On Tuesday, the couple attended a dinner party hosted by billionaire Jeff Bezos in Los Angeles. The couple reportedly arrived together in Kim's car and hung out at the party for hours before returning to the Beverly Hills hotel, according to TMZ.

According to People, the couple's appearance came days after Kim had a coffee date with Hillary and Chelsea Clinton on Monday. This meeting was reportedly tied to the mother-daughter duo's upcoming Gutsy Women Apple TV+ series.

January 19, 2022: Kim uses special 'P' emoji while vacationing with Pete

Kim Kardashian shared new pics from her tropical baecation with Pete Davidson, and it has left fans wondering if she's shouting out her new man or if it's all just one big coincidence.

First, she posed on the sand in the cheekiest string all-black bikini and rocked a matching black hat with the letter P engraved in an old-English font. She didn't stop there with the subtle hints. She captioned the pic "Beach Party" and used a special 'P' emoji.

While Kim could be showcasing clear hints of PDA with her caption, she also could be taking part in the new viral slang, courtesy of rapper Gunna's single, "Pushin' P," where "P" stands for keeping it "player" or keeping it real.

January 4, 2022: Kim and Pete head to The Bahamas

Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson brought their love connection into the new year. Daily Mail obtained photos of the bi-coastal couple boarding a private jet to The Bahamas.

While Kim has yet to post any selfies with her rumored bf during their baecation, she did post a bomb bikini-clad selfie.

December 22, 2021: Pete uses Kim's car to do some Christmas shopping

The holiday season is in full swing, and Pete Davidson just did some major shopping. Photogs snapped pics of the comedian leaving XIV Karats jewelry store with a handful of shopping bags. While deets on his purchases have yet to be revealed, Pete did get into Kim's Rolls-Royce as he left.

December 21, 2021: Kim and Pete enjoy a breakfast date

Day dates are fun as nighttime ones for Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson. TMZ released photos of the couple enjoying breakfast at the Fountain Coffee Room in the Beverly Hills Hotel. Pete smiled in the pic while Kim showed him something on her phone.

December 18, 2021: Kim came to Pete's hometown to see the latest Spider-Man film

Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson entered the Marvel Cinematic Universe for their most recent date night. Kete headed to the comedian's hometown of Staten Island to check out Spider-Man: No Way Home. Scott Disick joined the new couple as they watched the most recent installation of the hit Marvel franchise.

According to People, the trio went out to eat afterward. A TikTok video captured three women as they anxiously anticipated the trio's arrival at Staten Island's Angelina's restaurant.

November 27, 2021: A fan shares selfies with Kim and Pete

A breakfast date for Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson turned into a once-in-a-lifetime photo op for one fan. According to People, the couple was spotted at the Beverly Hills Hotel by a fan stopping for tea and talking on the phone with his mother at the hotel's bar on Saturday morning.

After noticing the couple, Dutch music journalist Paul Barewijk took selfies with Kim and Pete. "All of a sudden, I looked to my right and saw Pete Davidson," he told PEOPLE. "I talked further with my mom, and then I thought, 'Who is he talking with?' Because I know the latest dating rumors. And so, it was Kim Kardashian!"

Barewijk said the couple "looked happy" and walked away together. "It looked like a date to me," he said.

November 21, 2021: Pete sports a hickey during a date night with Kim

On Sunday, the Daily Mail reported that Kim and Pete had a romantic date at Giorgio Baldi Italian restaurant in Santa Monica, California. November 21. As Pete walked Kim to his Lamborghini SUV, the paparazzi snapped pics of what appears to be a hickey on the left side of Pete's neck. Other shots showed the couple laughing in Pete's car and walking to and from the restaurant.

November 19, 2021: Kim's friends open up about her relationship with Pete

Kim Kardashian is having the time of her life in her new relationship with Pete Davidson. According to PageSix, the reality star is "constantly giggling" whenever they're together. "She's acting like a teenager," a source told the outlet. "She's constantly giggling. Pete has made her feel like the clock has moved 20 years back. She seems happy."

November 18, 2021: Kim and Pete wear matching pajamas

Pete made things Instagram official, sharing a pic from his star-studded pajama-themed birthday party. He wore a pajama top that matched with PJ sets worn by Kim and her mother, Kris Jenner, while posing in a group shot with rap icon Flava, Flav.

Of course, they weren't just any pajamas. The trio wore plaid PJ sets courtesy of Kim's SKIMS brand.

According to E! News, things are official between the new couple. A source close to Kim told the outlet, "They are really happy and seeing where it goes." The source claims that "Pete has told her he doesn't want to see anyone else," and Kim reportedly feels the same.

"She is telling some people they aren't super serious, but she isn't seeing anyone else... She's trying not to make a big deal about it but is super into him." Along with reportedly being "smitten" and excited about her new relationship with Pete, Kim feels "giddy" around the comedian. "He makes her laugh the entire time they are together, and she is completely enthralled by him."

November 17, 2021: Paparazzi pics share first glimpse of Kim and Pete PDA

We've finally got some PDA!! Kim and Pete were caught holding hands in exclusive photos obtained by Daily Mail. Paparazzi pics followed the couple in a Palm Springs parking lot, where the Saturday Night Live star rocked the matching bottoms for the PJ set he twinned with Kim during his party.

November 2, 2021: Kim and Pete enjoy a date night in his hometown

Kim Kardashian took a trip to Pete Davidson's hometown of Staten Island, New York, for a romantic date night. According to Page Six, Pete wooed Kim with dinner at popular Italian hot-spot Campanias. "Pete arranged a dinner on the rooftop privately," a source told the outlet. "It was just the two of them." Kim and Pete managed to "sneak in and out with no security detail insight."

Another source told Page Six that Kim is "intrigued" by Pete. "She likes him," the source added.

October 29, 2021: Kim and Pete celebrate Halloween with a trip to a spooky amusement park

Kim and Pete celebrated spooky season by taking an adventure-filled trip to Knott's Scary Farm. People obtained photos of the duo holding hands as they rode a rollercoaster at the amusement park. A source told people they were getting to know each other. "They hang in the same circles, so they will be together from time to time," the source said. "It's just friends hanging out."

October 10, 2021: Kim and Pete share an onscreen kiss

Kim hosted her first-ever appearance on Saturday Night Live.

While she went viral for hilarious depictions of her sisters, she shared an on-screen kiss with Pete in a sketch as Aladdin and Princess Jasmine.

January 31, 2019: Kim tweeted a picture of Pete

Kim tweeted a picture of her husband Kanye West, celebrating Kid Cudi's birthday with Timothée Chalamet and Pete. "Happy Birthday @KidCudi," she captioned the post.
